News Application Documentation¶

Welcome to the documentation for the News Application, a Django-based project designed to manage and display news articles.

This documentation is intended for developers and reviewers who want to understand the structure, functionality, and usage of the project.

Project Overview¶

The News Application is built using the Django framework and follows a modular app-based architecture. Each app is documented separately to make the codebase easier to understand and maintain.
